property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: A room hidden in between the egg window entryway and the "ROOTS" room. This room is where [[Kris]] receives an [[Egg]].

property.name: page
property.value: 2nd Sanctuary#Therapy Room

property.name: description
property.value: A messy room that used to be [[Gerson Boom]]'s Study in the original [[Dark Sanctuary]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] can obtain [[Rhapsotea]]s from the teacup and leave 100 [[Dark Dollar]]s in exchange.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] remarks on the different atmosphere of her Dark World compared to the original [[Dark Sanctuary]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the prophecy window depicting the three heroes and expresses disbelief that she is a part of the prophecy.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the prophecy window depicting the third hero and concludes that it is depicting [[Ralsei]]. She suggests that there are separate prophecies for her, Ralsei, and [[Kris]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the prophecy window depicting the first hero and concludes that it is depicting [[Kris]]. She then suggests alternate depictions of Kris that better represent their character.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the prophecy window and concludes that her prophecy is next to be listed.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the prophecy window depicting the second hero and concludes that it is depicting her. She then wonders if there are any other prophecies depicting the [[party]].

property.name: description
property.value: While climbing the tower, [[Susie]] explains what being depicted in the prophecy means to her. She explains that, because of her adventures with the rest of the [[party]], she now has "hope crossed on her heart."

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices another prophecy window depicting the second hero and runs off, looking for more.

property.name: description
property.value: A hidden entryway among a group of windows. Repeatedly walking between this entryway transports [[Kris]] to the [[2nd Sanctuary#Therapy Room|Therapy Room]].

property.name: description
property.value: The [[Sound of Justice]] appears and destroys the prophecy windows before [[Susie]] can finish reading. Susie and [[Kris]] chase after the Sound of Justice and fall through a cracked floor.

property.name: description
property.value: The floor suddenly collapses, and a horde of dark eyeballs appears. [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] begin climbing up the wall to avoid the dark eyeball horde.

property.name: description
property.value: As [[Kris]] attempts to climb to the top, the footholds crumble away, causing them to fall and be saved by [[Susie]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] asks [[Kris]] if the [[Gerson Boom|Old Man]] would want to come to their [[Castle Town]].

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] notices the [[Sound of Justice]] walking away and urges [[Kris]] to go after it.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] appears and destroys the [[Sound of Justice]]. He explains that Darkners formed from the dust of deceased monsters can only exist in specific Dark Worlds. He then goes on to explain that he knows everything about the prophecy, including how it ends. [[Susie]] reassures Ralsei that they are still a team.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] asks [[Ralsei]] if he knows any codes to any doors, which he denies.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] asks [[Ralsei]] about [[Noelle]]. Ralsei says that he knows what items she can equip, but he also says that Susie is supposed to equip ribbons.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[Fire Extinguisher]] explains that they know the code to the door, which is "2202." [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] then head back to the [[Dark Fountain]].

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing a Rhapsotea.

properties.property: Treasure chest containing an item that varies depending on how much money was donated to the fountain in the original [[Dark Sanctuary]] * No donation: Nothing * 1-99 D$: [[Darker Candy]] * 100-499 D$: [[Scarlixir]] * 500-1999 D$: [[Revive Mint]] * 2000-9998 D$: [[Bitter Tear]] * 9999+ D$: [[Gold Widow]]

property.name: description
property.value: Sacred moss, which [[Kris]] is given the option to consume. If they have previously consumed the moss in the previous [[chapter]]s, they are given the "Moss Most" title.

property.name: description
property.value: Appears after interacting with the [[Man]]. Interacting with the canvas triggers a scene in which [[Kriss]] attempts and fails to draw the Man and receives the Egg.

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest containing 500 Dark Dollars.

property.name: page
property.value: Dark Dollar

property.name: description
property.value: If the [[Mystic Band]] was not collected from this treasure chest in the original [[Dark Sanctuary]], the chest can be opened here to reveal a Power Band.

property.name: page
property.value: Power Band

properties.property: BUT LO, ON HOPES AND DREAMS THEY SEND. THREE HEROES AT THE WORLD'S END.
THE LIGHT AND DARK, BOTH BURNING DIRE. A COUNTDOWN TO THE EARTH'S EXPIRE.
IF FOUNTAINS FREED, THE ROARING CRIES. AND TITANS SHAPE FROM DARKENED EYES.
THE THIRD HERO. THE PRINCE, ALONE IN DEEPEST DARK
THE LORD OF SCREENS CLEAVED RED BY BLADE.
THE FIRST HERO. THE CAGE, WITH HUMAN SOUL AND PARTS!
AND LAST, WAS THE GIRL. AT LAST, WAS THE GIRL.

property.name: description
property.value: .ecnarbmemer ruoy wohs lliw noitanod taerg a ,edis rehto eht ot ssap uoy nehW

properties.property: THE SECOND HERO. THE GIRL, WITH HOPE CROSSED ON HER HEART.

property.name: description
property.value: ''LOVE FINDS ITS WAY TO THE GIRL.''

properties.property: And so wept the fallen star, making rivers with its tears. Then, slowly, from the bitter water, something grew. It looked like glass.

property.name: description
property.value: ''THE GIRL''

property.name: description
property.value: ''THE GIRL''

property.name: description
property.value: ''The Gallery of Ancient Faces''

properties.property:
THE LAST PROPHECY. THE STORY'S END.
TO SAVE THE WORLDS, THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullet that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullet that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullet that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullet that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Bullet that damages [[Kris]] if touched.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: Opening that continuously spawns Dark Eyeballs.

property.name: description
property.value: Opening that continuously spawns Dark Eyeballs.

property.name: description
property.value: Opening that continuously spawns Dark Eyeballs from all directions.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A Dark Eyeball that damages [[Kris]] if touched. Can be destroyed by jumping into it while climbing.

property.name: description
property.value: A puzzle initially presented as another piano puzzle akin to those in the original [[Dark Sanctuary]]. However, upon playing a note, the piano itself starts moving with the directional inputs instead. The piano can be used to destroy the bookshelves and reveal the way forward.

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of two Winglades.

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter consisting of two Organikks.

property.name: description
property.value: A Wicabel pops out of one of the bells and attacks [[Kris]].

property.name: description
property.value: A statue stand with [[Kris]]'s name on it. Triggers an enemy encounter against [[Organikk]] and [[Wicabel]].

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter against an [[Organikk]] and [[Wicabel]]. Only appears after re-entering the room.

property.name: description
property.value: Boss battle against the Sound of Justice.

property.name: page
property.value: Sound of Justice#In Battle

property.name: description
property.value: Enemy encounter against two Organikks. If defeated non-violently, the Organikk becomes an NPC who explains that they were trying to protect their petrified ancestors.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the state of [[Susie]]'s Dark World as another side of the Dark World she attempted to return to.

property.name: description
property.value: Claims to know and understand everything.

property.name: description
property.value: Claims to know and understand nothing.

property.name: description
property.value: Expresses confusion as to the possibility of there being something inside an acorn and admits that they do not know what an acorn is.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks whose dream this is and lists [[Kris]], [[Susie]], the [[Knight]] or themselves as possible answers.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks whose dream this is.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks whose dream this is.

property.name: description
property.value: Reacts to how much money was donated to the fountain in the original [[Dark Sanctuary]]. If no money was donated, the Organikk is hostile and attacks the [[party]].

property.name: description
property.value: Asks [[Kris]] if they have heard of "Hyperlink Blocked," to which Kris can respond with "Yes" or "No.'

property.name: description
property.value: Wonders what to call a man with one eye.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks why the angel makes its cry.

property.name: description
property.value: Asks who will call the girl who snows.

property.name: description
property.value: Only exclaims "I don't know."

property.name: description
property.value: States that there is a room in between the entryway. They then recite a scambled message, reading "Lost where the forest would grow, the children followed the pointed tail."

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Rudinn]], implied to be one of the Seven [[Flying Aces]]. They explain that [[Kris]]'s appointment is ready.

property.name: description
property.value: A hidden tree, behind which the [[Man]] resides.

property.name: description
property.value: A Man behind the tree. He directs [[Kris]] to the canvas to the bottom-right.

property.name: description
property.value: A member of the Art Club. Asks [[Kris]] if they are there for Art Club as well.

property.name: description
property.value: A hidden sink. [[Kris]] can wash their hands after receiving the [[Egg]].

property.name: description
property.value: Welcomes [[Kris]] to "Club Apatheia," an archaeological exhibit.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring a petrified [[Wafer]], referring to them as their ancestor. They declare that they should be more like the Wafer.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the petrified [[Balthizard]]. They speculate on what could have been under its shell.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the [[Starwalker]] statue.

property.name: description
property.value: A petrified Starwalker stands here if he was found during [[Chapter 1]].

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the [[Watercooler]] statue, calling it the peak of beauty.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the stack of petrified [[Cuptains]]. They declare that lessons could be learned from their formation.

property.name: description
property.value: Is waiting to turn into a statue.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the petrified [[Organikk]], which they call an overachiever.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen admiring the petrified [[Bibliox]]. They state that the Bibliox's writing system was better than their own.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen expressing relief at the [[Guei]]'s petrified state.

property.name: description
property.value: Claims to know something important, but [[Susie]] does not want to hear it.

property.name: page
property.value: Fire Extinguisher

property.name: description
property.value: ''The lighting has changed.''

properties.property: The lighting has changed. But the power that fills you, has not.

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE Point below the [[Study]]

properties.property: The fire has run empty. In its place... ... a stale glow, which offers no warmth.
